channel.title: Lightweights Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
channel.itunes:summary: Parasailing, driving NASCARS, betting our bank account in Vegas, and giving money to our listeners EVERY WEEK! Third wheel this best-friendship that started as a joke but now they're in a bromance. Hosts Joe (Ugh It's Joe) and Ilya are social media personalities that know how to have a great time. Listen to Lightweights you never know what Hollywood will bring their way . Join the movement, call in, and lets have fun!

item.itunes:title: Crashing Into A Taco Bell (Brian Dales; The Summer Set)
item.title: Crashing Into A Taco Bell (Brian Dales; The Summer Set)
item.itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
item.itunes:summary:
Playing the Macy's Day Thanksgiving Parade, a pole piercing through the windshield off a moving truck, and getting the band back together. We have Brian Dales (lead singer of the band THE SUMMER SET), who Joe met at Erin Gilfoys wedding last week. His band THE SUMMER SET has gotten back together after a 5 year hiatus and is releasing a new song today! We talk Warped Tour, getting back together, tour pranks, and which song elevated them to new heights.

item.itunes:summary: Welcome all! This is the 4/20 edition pod that didn't go as planned, we got too high and had to stop, but finished the next day lol.
